title: Henri Bendel
seo_title: WestHouse is proud to announce its newest partnership with Henri Bendel
seo_description: WestHouse is proud to announce its newest partnership with Henri Bendel
contents:
WestHouse is proud to announce its newest partnership with Henri Bendel.

Henri Bendel’s Fifth Avenue Flagship store, only two blocks away from WestHouse, is one of New York’s iconic landmarks with its beautiful and one of a kind Lalique windows. Henri Bendel is the perfect Holiday shopping destination, where you will find handbags, jewelry, fashion accessories and more…

While booking your upcoming stay, you can choose from two exclusive packages; the Shop in ‘Suite’ Style and the HB Shopping Spree. 

The Shop in ‘Suite’ Style includes a suite and $100 Henri Bendel gift card along with a complimentary personal styling appointment at the flagship store. The HB Shopping Spree, offered to guests who book the Prestige Suite, includes a $5,000 Henri Bendel gift card along with a complimentary personal styling appointment, luxury car transfer to and from Henri Bendel, in-room amenities including Henri Bendel cupcakes and candles, WestHouse Resident Privileges, and 2pm late checkout.
